name: Proposed_Resolution_20-933.pdf
text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-933 (Deemed Approved October 31, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4707

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
July 14, 2014

To confirm the reappo intment of Ms. Cathy Borris-Hale to the District of Columbia Board of Nursing.

RESOLV ED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA , That this
resolution may be cited as the "District of Columbia Board of Nursing Cathy Borris-Hale
Confirmation Resolution of 2014".
Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirm s the reappointment of:
Ms. Cathy Borris-Hale
220 Peabody Street, N.E.
Washington , D.C. 20011
(Ward 4)
as a Registered Nurse member of the District of Columbia Board of Nursing, pursuant to
section 204 of the District of Columbia Health Occupations Revision Act of 1985, effective
March 25, 1986 (D.C. Law 6-99; D.C. Official Code § 3-1202.04), and in accordance with
section 2(f)(6) of the Confirmation Act of 1978, effective March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law 2- 142;
D.C. Official Code § l-523.0 l(f)(6)), for a term to end July 21, 20 17.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of th is resolution,
upon its adoption , to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

District of
Columbia
Board of
Nursing Cathy
Borris-Hale
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
title: District of Columbia Board of Nursing Cathy Borris-Hale Confirmation Resolution of 2014
